entry.title: TechTurf-ops/BestBuy-GPU-Buyer: A lightweight Tampermonkey user script that automates Best Buy stock checking and purchasing.
entry.content: A lightweight Tampermonkey user script that automates Best Buy stock checking and purchasing.

entry.title: GauravSingh696/Color-Changer: This is a simple and interactive web application that allows users to change the background color of the page dynamically. The project is built using ReactJs, making it lightweight and easy to use. It serves as a great example of how JavaScript can manipulate the DOM to create engaging and responsive web applications.
entry.content: This is a simple and interactive web application that allows users to change the background color of the page dynamically. The project is built using ReactJs, making it lightweight and easy to use. It serves as a great example of how JavaScript can manipulate the DOM to create engaging and responsive web applications.

entry.title: aayushsuwalka08/Todoie-App: Todoie is a lightweight and user-friendly task management app built with React. It helps users create, track, and organize their daily tasks efficiently. With a clean UI and seamless user experience, Todoie ensures that users stay productive and never miss an important task.
entry.content: Todoie is a lightweight and user-friendly task management app built with React. It helps users create, track, and organize their daily tasks efficiently. With a clean UI and seamless user experience, Todoie ensures that users stay productive and never miss an important task.

entry.content: Modular lightweight request library extendable by plugins.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.title: rdmistra/selfhost-dl: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js—no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.
entry.content: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js—no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.
